message.content:
cs.CR, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.SI, cs.SY 

This paper discusses the use of a Bayesian hierarchical model for criminal investigations, which involves analyzing intelligence reports and evaluating potential threats posed by individuals. This topic falls under the category of computer security and cryptography (cs.CR), as well as artificial intelligence (cs.AI) and machine learning (cs.LG) due to the use of Bayesian modeling. Additionally, the paper discusses the real-time propagation of evidence, which could be relevant to the sub-categories of social and information networks (cs.SI) and systems and control (cs.SY).
